timeline.title: A Old School
timeline.content: I did my first Interaction with a software development company and they were too slow for startups... so i made one for velocity.. we make softwares like cake

timeline.title: New Members
timeline.content: I Scaled my company to 4 Members... ₹40L in revenue... ₹15L in profits...

timeline.title: Even New Members
timeline.content: I Scaled even big .... 8 Members .... ₹10L in first quarter .... ₹2L in profits.. i was scaling so profits was going in toilet...

timeline.title: a kid
timeline.content: it was just an idea to merge IOT with AI to build something amazing, My Initial MVP was a Simple IOT Device that detects human daily routine and automates switches

timeline.title: a breaking toy
timeline.content: I made a Initial Prototype where major Circuit development is done by my other friends and server side development by me ... it was breaking like hell...

timeline.title: kid got big
timeline.content: We Got initial Funding of ₹200K which i thought was too big...

timeline.title: i convinced some big guys
timeline.content: There was a small subcontractor in our College Area who wanted to install our project in his build flats .. i sold when it was not even completely built.. super good thing was i sold it for ₹100K as setup and installment

timeline.title: The End...
timeline.content: I was not able to complete the entire project... Server side was done ... but circuit there i lacked knowledge... i think you need talented and reliable team to build something..

timeline.title: A Interaction Platform
timeline.content: I found a Gap between technology leaders and our ongoing education, why IIT's and MIT's have success is not because they have good teachers but ecosystem produces top notch leaders

timeline.title: First Seminar
timeline.content: I did first Seminar, Previously my college teachers became my student in this one..., sadly didn't make any $$$, but was featured in Local newspaper

timeline.title: Second Seminar
timeline.content: This year i did 2 Seminars, students from IIT's Came to this one..., sadly didn't make any $$$
